name: Electron but Fixed
description:
My entry into GMTK had an issue with the second last level that broke it. This is uploaded as a fixed version just in case anyone wants to play the last levels

A platformer game where you can't jump or move in any way. Except for an 8 directional dash.

Bumping into glowing walls resets your dash, and dashing diagonally down when on the ground gives a shorter dash.
